summary: CONSUMER COMPLAINED ABOUT HAVING PROBLEMS WITH  RECALL  REPAIRS THAT WERE PERFORMED ON THE  FLOOR SHIFTER.  IT HAD ACTUALLY MADE IT WORSE ON THE SHIFTER BECAUSE THE CONSUMER HAD A HARD TIME SHIFTING GEARS.  THE MANUFACTURER WAS CONTACTED,  AND STATED THERE WAS NOTHING THAT THEY COULD DO.   *AK   IT WAS DIFFICULT TO PLACE THE SHIFTER FROM REVERSE INTO PARK AND WOULD END UP IN NEUTRAL.   *SCC  *JB
